Datasheet Description

This datasheet is randomly sampled subset from the WHO-STEPS Survey conducted for NCD Risk Factor Surveillance.

Datasheet consist of observations of 3000 participants and selected variables collected at each step.

Rows: 3,000
Columns: 13
$ Gender              <chr> "Women", "Men", "Men", "Women", "Men", "Women", "M…
$ Age                 <dbl> 60, 67, 18, 67, 38, 58, 60, 39, 19, 35, 45, 50, 53…
$ Age_Group           <chr> "59-69", "59-69", "18-30", "59-69", "30-44", "44-5…
$ Education           <chr> "Illiterate", "Higher Secondary +", "Higher Second…
$ SBP                 <dbl> 116.66667, 166.66667, 127.66667, 106.33333, 114.00…
$ DBP                 <dbl> 77.00000, 97.33333, 79.33333, 67.00000, 74.00000, …
$ BMI                 <dbl> 16.10928, 25.29558, 22.17560, 17.28791, 18.14509, …
$ LDL                 <dbl> 49.2, 74.6, 53.8, 42.0, 28.0, 95.6, 70.0, 58.0, 53…
$ Smoking             <chr> "No", "No", "No", "No", "Yes", "No", "Yes", "No", …
$ Physical_Inactivity <chr> "No", "No", "No", "Yes", "No", "No", "Yes", "No", …
$ Raised_BP           <chr> "No", "Yes", "No", "No", "No", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes"…
$ District            <chr> "Balaghat", "Satna", "Ratlam", "Dindori", "Damoh",…
$ WSTEP3              <dbl> 8398.779, 6269.137, 30503.785, 8898.991, 16746.247…
